Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:07:45
Folder: C1QKGL0 - mall permit rejection allied tdm stores - expired insurance certificate
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1QKGL0_00
From: Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-09-30 14:34
Subject: Mall Permit Rejection Allied TDM Stores - Expired insurance certificate
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings!

 

I wanted to let you know that our permit request for the Allied stores at the Dubai Mall are getting rejected because the store's compliance documents had expired. Please send us the renewed store insurance certificate so that we can update the store records with the mall operation team and obtain the permit approval.

 



 



 

Looking forward to your kind reply

 

Kind regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​	
ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION	
REAL EMIRATES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 387 2000	
+97145632034
